overview:
1. Executive Director & CFO, SEEDfund

  2. Exec. VP Operations of Hurix Technologies, a Deloitte Fast 50 company focusing on publishing services

  3. Co-founder of Brainvisa, one of the leading e-learning companies in India

  4. Started his career with finance stints at Asian Paints and ICICI Treasury

  5. Masters from Indian Institute of Management and a Graduate in Engineering

  6. Anand loves to motivate entrepreneurs, help them in structuring their finances, handle legalese and be a sounding board on day to day operations
